fields.name: Human
fields.description: Standard baseline. No required detriments or benefits.

fields.name: Rock Human
fields.description: Resilient stone-like bodies with stealth via terrain merging.

fields.name: Vampire
fields.description: Stronger than humans but with major weaknesses.

fields.name: Pillar Man
fields.description: You descend from an ancient lineage of near-perfect beings. Evolution is in your bones.

fields.name: Gray Matter
fields.description: Extraterrestrial origins grant unique morphing and sensory abilities.

fields.name: Haunting
fields.description: Half-dead entities with ethereal powers and haunted vulnerabilities.

fields.name: Cyborg
fields.description: Augmented with mechanical parts; powerful but fragile around tech.

fields.name: Oracle
fields.description: Supernatural mediums burdened by uncontrollable visions and fate.

fields.name: Physically Inferior
fields.description: -1d when resisting physical harm.

fields.name: Bizarre Blindspot
fields.description: -1d when resisting Stand, Hamon, or supernatural effects.

fields.name: Slower Recovery
fields.description: Healing clock permanently reduced by 1 segment.

fields.name: Slower Movement
fields.description: Base movement speed reduced from 30ft to 20ft.

fields.name: Skilled From Birth
fields.description: Can start with 3 dots in a single skill instead of the usual cap of 2.

fields.name: Sheer Grit
fields.description: Once per session, reroll any failed roll.

fields.name: Tactical Awareness
fields.description: +1d to all reaction-based rolls in combat.

fields.name: Resourceful
fields.description: Gain +1 downtime action for training, healing, or crafting.

fields.name: Sinks Like a Rock
fields.description: Cannot swim or float.

fields.name: Slow Regeneration
fields.description: Healing clock gains +1 segment.

fields.name: Hunted by Rock Humans
fields.description: Other Rock Humans sense your location within 100ft.

fields.name: Slow Reflexes
fields.description: -1d when resisting physical attacks.

fields.name: Vulnerable to Vibrations
fields.description: Sound-based attacks deal +1 Harm.

fields.name: Cold-Brittle
fields.description: Freezing temperatures halve your speed.

fields.name: Sediment Body
fields.description: Can reshape into stone or pebbles for stealth.

fields.name: Hardened Physique
fields.description: Gain 1 extra Stand Armor charge per scene.

fields.name: Rock Punches
fields.description: Unarmed attacks now deal Level 2 Harm.

fields.name: Camouflage
fields.description: If stationary, can merge with stone.

fields.name: Mudshot
fields.description: Fire hardened mud to immobilize targets for 1 turn.

fields.name: Tolerance
fields.description: Reduced detriment effects by half.

fields.name: Sunlight Weakness
fields.description: Takes Level 4 Harm per minute in direct sunlight.

fields.name: Hamon Vulnerability
fields.description: Hamon techniques deal +1 Harm and bypass armor.

fields.name: Bloodthirst
fields.description: Must feed on blood or suffer penalties.

fields.name: Must Be Invited Inside
fields.description: Cannot enter homes without invitation.

fields.name: Hunger Without Feeding
fields.description: Max stress decreases by 1 per day without feeding.

fields.name: Holy Symbol Weakness
fields.description: Cross deals Level 2 Harm and stuns.

fields.name: Silver Allergy
fields.description: Silver weapons ignore armor.

fields.name: Blood Puppeteer
fields.description: Command a victim for 1 round after feeding.

fields.name: Mist Form
fields.description: Turn into mist for 3 turns but cannot attack.

fields.name: Regeneration
fields.description: Spend 1 stress to heal 1 segment of harm.

fields.name: Bat Form
fields.description: Fly using 1 stress per turn.

fields.name: Staying Power
fields.description: Avoid KO by sacrificing a limb; limbs can survive separately.

fields.name: Sunlight Turns to Stone
fields.description: Petrified indefinitely in direct sunlight.

fields.name: Hamon Weakness
fields.description: Hamon techniques deal +1 Harm and bypass armor.

fields.name: Cold Weakness
fields.description: Freezing temps slow movement & reaction time.

fields.name: Weak to Blood Loss
fields.description: Cannot regenerate if below half health.

fields.name: Requires Adaptation
fields.description: Must spend 1 downtime action per session training.

fields.name: Hunted by Zeppeli
fields.description: Hamon users worldwide seek to exterminate you.

fields.name: Hyper-Intelligence
fields.description: +2d on Insight-based actions once per scene.

fields.name: Superior Physiology
fields.description: +1d to resisting physical harm.

fields.name: Chainsaw Arm
fields.description: Retractable bone chainsaw deals Level 2 Harm.

fields.name: Weighted Feathers
fields.description: Long-range attack dealing Level 2 Harm at 60ft.

fields.name: Life Absorption
fields.description: Drain enemies to regain health.

fields.name: Body Modification
fields.description: Reshape body mid-combat to escape grapples or extend limbs.

fields.name: Weak to Electricity
fields.description: Electrical attacks deal +1 Harm & disable transformations.

fields.name: Alien Understanding
fields.description: -1d on social interactions unless disguised as human.

fields.name: Sensitive to Soundwaves
fields.description: Loud noises cause pain and disorientation.

fields.name: Cannot Speak English
fields.description: Must communicate via symbols or mimicry.

fields.name: Cannot Heal Normally
fields.description: Requires specific alien tech to recover.

fields.name: Heat Sensitivity
fields.description: High temperatures disrupt shape-shifting.

fields.name: Shapechange
fields.description: Morph into organic or inanimate forms.

fields.name: Enhanced Senses
fields.description: Detect movement in 360Â° around you.

fields.name: Perfect Mimicry
fields.description: Copy voice and appearance.

fields.name: Blindsight
fields.description: Sense movement in total darkness.

fields.name: Reflex Overclock
fields.description: +1d to dodging attacks.

fields.name: No Vital Signs
fields.description: Immune to poison, disease, scanners.

fields.name: Hamon Disrupts Form
fields.description: Hamon deals +1 Harm and disables phasing.

fields.name: Unstable Physiology
fields.description: At 0 stress, on d6 1-3 gain an extra trauma.

fields.name: Cannot Heal Normally
fields.description: Requires spiritual rituals to recover.

fields.name: Disrupts Electronics
fields.description: Presence causes tech failures.

fields.name: Cold Weakness
fields.description: Low temperatures slow movement.

fields.name: Unfinished Business
fields.description: Compelled to act against your will.

fields.name: Ghostly Aura
fields.description: Harder to detect in dim light or darkness.

fields.name: Ethereal Nature
fields.description: +1d when resisting mental attacks.

fields.name: Phase Through Objects
fields.description: Pass through solid barriers for 1 turn.

fields.name: Poltergeist
fields.description: Move small objects telekinetically.

fields.name: Fear Aura
fields.description: Enemies within 5ft must roll Resolve or hesitate.

fields.name: Resurrection
fields.description: Once per campaign, return as a more powerful entity upon death.

fields.name: EMP Vulnerability
fields.description: Electric attacks deal +1 Harm and disable cybernetics for 1 turn.

fields.name: Limited Repairs
fields.description: Healing requires a technician or mechanical parts.

fields.name: Heavy Frame
fields.description: Movement speed reduced by 10ft.

fields.name: Maintenance Required
fields.description: Missing repairs causes -1d to physical actions.

fields.name: Loss of Touch
fields.description: No sense of pain or temperature.

fields.name: Cybernetic Overload
fields.description: Overuse in one scene causes Level 2 Harm (System Overheat).

fields.name: Hidden Arsenal
fields.description: Built-in weapon deals Level 2 Harm.

fields.name: Enhanced Reflexes
fields.description: Once per scene, instantly dodge an attack.

fields.name: Optic Targeting
fields.description: +1d to all ranged attacks.

fields.name: Integrated Tools
fields.description: Built-in tools give +1d to Tinker actions.

fields.name: Visions Uncontrollable
fields.description: Receive prophecy flashes forcing a Resolve roll.

fields.name: Cursed Fate
fields.description: Trauma may force a new long-term consequence.

fields.name: Precognitive Instinct
fields.description: Once per scene ask GM a yes/no future question.

fields.name: Spiritual Awareness
fields.description: +1d when detecting supernatural forces.

fields.name: Danger Sense
fields.description: Always act first in combat.

fields.name: Divination
fields.description: Read an object's past by touch (GM discretion).

fields.name: Supernatural Resistance
fields.description: Once per scene ignore a supernatural consequence.

fields.name: Manifest Destiny
fields.description: Once per session reroll on any fate-related check.
